properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:46PM PST until January 18 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
3 to 7 inches. Pockets of light freezing rain in the valleys,
with a light glaze of ice possible.

* WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Expect snow and ice covered road surfaces.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will hold around 1500 feet this
evening, the slowly rising to 2500 feet later tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM SATURDAY
